alert.note: Alert for Carolina (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 05 at 6:44PM AST until February 05 at 9:00PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for... Carolina Municipality in Puerto Rico... * Until 845 PM AST. * At 641 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated moderate to heavy rain that will cause the urban and small stream flooding in the advisory area to continue. one to three inches of rain have fallen, and up to an additional inch of rain is possible. Even though the rainfall is gradually diminishing, it will take some time for the flood waters to drain. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Carolina.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
